item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Step by Step Review the current developer documentation here, here & here; . Go through Carlos Gutierrez’s user journey. Go through Sierra McNulty’s user journey. Review the proposed easy-wins. Review our current concept designs. Review at least one prototype draft, outside of #’s 2 & 3. Submit feedback. Troubleshooting For troubleshooting any of the technical aspects; please be sure to send me an email, with the following pieces of information included in the subject & body:

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Purpose I’ve created this resource to help: Collect resources associated with the required domain knowledge for fintech Provide a central place for observations & feedback from team-wide interviews Provide examples of developer documentation & resource plans Provide practical use case(s) designed to explain resolutions Showcase demos, prototypes, roadmaps & everything in between Requirements To make the most use of this resource, you’ll need: A stable internet connection OR to save this sequence for offline viewing.

item.title: Dictionary
item.description: Start here, with more coming soon…
